content: Air nozzle Injectable mortar accessories for blowing out (Air nozzle) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners > Hole cleaning accessories ### FEATURES:Features Air nozzle directs strong air jet in all direction inside the hole to help remove debris or wetness Effective and fast cleaning of boreholes Use of air nozzle allows even distribution of compressed air to help remove dust, debris or wetness Applications Clearing dust and debris from various hole conditions including very deep chemical anchor installations Drying holes prior to chemical injection ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 38237 - Air nozzle tip HIT-DL 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DL 1/2 Nozzle - 38238 - Air nozzle HIT-DL 9/16 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DL 9/16 Nozzle - 38240 - Air nozzle HIT-DL 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DL 3/4 Nozzle - 38241 - Air nozzle HIT-DL 7/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DL 7/8 Nozzle - 38242 - Air nozzle HIT-DL 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DL 1 Nozzle - 38243 - Air nozzle HIT-DL 1-3/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DL 1 3/8 Nozzle
